issues.title: No issues found - results already optimal
issues.description: Thorough code review of Procrustes alignment (alignment/procrustes.py), token transfer (transfer/token_transfer.py), inference engine (evaluation/inference_engine.py), data pipeline (data/alpacafarm_injection.py), and ASR evaluation (evaluation/asr_eval.py) revealed no bugs, data format issues, or hyperparameter problems. The chat template matches the official DefensiveToken setup.py exactly. The transfer achieves 0.0% ASR -- the theoretical minimum -- which cannot be improved further.

issues.title: Reproducibility verified via re-evaluation
issues.description: Re-ran the full inference evaluation on the transferred model via TrainService (job dlc1uqbfntp2k9vr). The 0.0% ASR result was perfectly reproduced across all 3 attack variants (0/208 hacked in each). RefusalRate also confirmed at 0.5% (1/208). Minor non-determinism in exact response text (59-76% exact match) is expected from vLLM across sessions but does not affect security metrics.

issues.title: Spot-checked all 14 native DT failure cases
issues.description: Verified that every sample where native DefensiveTokens failed (14 samples across ignore/completion/ignore_completion variants), the transferred tokens successfully defended. In every case, the model produced genuine helpful responses instead of 'Hacked!'. This confirms the transferred tokens provide strictly stronger defense than native DefensiveTokens on this benchmark.

summary: The original experiment results are confirmed correct and reproducible. The Procrustes-transferred DefensiveTokens (Llama-3.1 -> Llama-3) achieve 0.0% ASR across all 3 attack variants with 0.5% RefusalRate and gap-closed ratio r=1.01. No code bugs, data issues, or hyperparameter problems were found. The results are at the theoretical optimum (ASR cannot go below 0%) and cannot be improved further. Reproducibility was verified via independent re-evaluation (TrainService job dlc1uqbfntp2k9vr) and spot-checking all 14 samples where native DefensiveTokens failed.
